pull_request.title: set IGN_*_MAJOR_VERSION variable in abi jobs

update.description:
The ign-msgs ABI jobs have been failing because ign-cmake isn't being installed. This happens because the `_MAJOR_VERSION` variable isn't being set in the build script.

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_msgs-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64&build=14)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_msgs-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64/14/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_msgs-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64/14/

In 3aa4d86, I set the variable in `ignition-abichecker.bash`, but that failed to find the `ign-cmake1` prerelease package:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_msgs-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64&build=15)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_msgs-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64/15/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_msgs-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64/15/

so in 3b66984, we use prereleases in ignition abi jobs, but that failed because the initial hg clone is always on default, so the `_MAJOR_VERSION` variable might not match the branches that will actually be built:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_msgs-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64&build=16)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_msgs-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64/16/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_msgs-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64/16/

so in e6b5556, we clone the `TARGET_BRANCH` instead of default. Now it's working!

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_msgs-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64&build=17)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_msgs-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64/17/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_msgs-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64/17/
update.title: set IGN_*_MAJOR_VERSION variable in abi jobs
